title: Region Switching .
body:
Hello, this has been on my mind for a while and now it has finally made me break, so I'm here to address a small issue with big consequences.
I've had to switch regions and the problem is one I can only do it once and two it costs money. I don't find that acceptable having to pay 20 euros for a small change, some of us are moving families (also known as expats) and we travel to various countries every year or few months. So having to create new accounts to play league and having to level up again is a pain in the (blank). I just hope you can pass this to your superiors and make league of legends more of a connected game where we can move to a new country or go on holidays and still be able to play league no matter the region you're in. Right now I'm stuck and I'm not motivated to play league with a level 8 account whereas I'm Silver in my Oceania account (which was in Euw a while back). Please make this insignificant change that will have a big cause.  
King regards 
Just someone who wants to play league.

replies.body: There are a few different reasons as to why those account transfers aren't free. If you've got something out of your control moving you across the globe so often, I'm sure we might be able to work something out in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
Oh ok, Thanks Il send a ticket
